Formulary Status

Code Description Comment Version
G This observation/service is on the formulary, and has guidelines added v2.4
N This observation/service is not on the formulary added v2.4
R This observation/service is on the formulary, but is restricted added v2.4
Y This observation/service is on the formulary added v2.4
